title: Delicious peanut butter cookies
ingredients: ['170g unsalted butter, room temp', '105g light brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '185g peanut butter (smooth OR crunchy)', '1 large egg', '1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract', '260g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '60g chopped peanuts or chocolate chips (optional)']
